title: Wild Creatures: Voices Foley, Pack 1
description: Voices of the Wilderness: Creatures foley sound-pack for fantasy and adventurous games.
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE

Introducing “Wild Creatures: Voices Foley, Pack 1,” containing 21 types of creature sounds, totaling 297 sounds. From thin voices to deep growling, soaring to snoring, alien-like to weird, this audio pack offers a wide variety of creature types. Check out the list of sounds in the PDF.


Use Cases for Game Developers


Horror Games:

Atmospheric Tension: Utilize the deep growling and eerie sounds to build tension and create a spine-chilling atmosphere.


Jump Scares:

Implement sudden, unexpected creature sounds to enhance jump scares and keep players on edge.

Fantasy Adventures:


Magical Creatures:

Bring magical and mythical creatures to life with sounds that range from alien-like to weird, adding a layer of fantasy to your game world.


Epic Battles:

Use the varied creature sounds to make epic battles more dynamic and engaging.


TIP: The sounds are dry. Add some reverb or echo to create desired environments.
technicalDetails:
TOTAL UNIQUE SOUNDS: 297


CHECK FILE LIST PDF 


Number of Audio Waves: 297+297+297

Number of Audio Cues: 297+297+297

Sample rate / bit rate: 96kHz-24bit + 48kHz-24bit + 44.1kHz-24bit

Audio file types: Wav

Loopable: NO

Additional: Stereo 

Minutes of audio provided: 9:21

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
